Complete Reference
==================

The contents of the sub-modules *baseline* and *peak* are imported to 
*peaktuils*, and it is not needed to import them directly.

The *plot* sub-module must be explicitly imported due to its *matplotlib*
dependency.

peakutils.baseline
------------------

    :members:
    :special-members:
